search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Agolix (agolix.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Agolix is: [https://app.agolix.com/pricing](https://app.agolix.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Plans and Pricing
-----------------

Agolix offers a range of plans designed to fit the diverse needs of coaches, consultants, and small business owners. Choose the plan that best aligns with your goals and start transforming your business.

Basic

Perfect if you're just getting started with assessments

$29

per month (billed annually)

5 Active Assessments  
5,000 Responses per month

[GET STARTED](https://app.agolix.com/purchase?plan=BASIC&period=annual)

*   Unlimited Questions
*   Free Email Support
*   Mobile Friendly
*   Customize Colors and Logos
*   Multiple Question Types
*   Use AI to generate questions
*   Score in multiple categories
*   Provide Results Dynamically
*   Generate PDF Report   ⓘ
*   Export Responses
*   Group Responses
*   Social Media Branding

Most Popular

Advanced

Best for a more customized client experience and the opportunity to monetize assessments

$41

per month (billed annually)

10 Active Assessments  
10,000 Responses per month

[GET STARTED](https://app.agolix.com/purchase?plan=ADVANCED&period=annual)

Everything in Basic plus:

*   Free Priority Support
*   Enhanced PDF Reporting   ⓘ
*   Google Font Support
*   CRM Integration
*   Redirect based on score
*   Support for Custom Plugins
*   Regulate Assessment Access
*   Monetize your Assessments
*   Conditional Logic
*   Save and Resume

Private Label

For those who want to showcase their brand with custom urls and branded emails

$66

per month (billed annually)

15 Active Assessments  
50,000 Responses per month

[GET STARTED](https://app.agolix.com/purchase?plan=PRIVATE&period=annual)

Everything in Advanced plus:

*   Removal of Agolix branding
*   Support for custom subdomain
*   Branded Emails
*   Use Custom Fonts
*   Alert by Group

Need more? [Contact Us](https://app.agolix.com/contactus?subject=Enterprise%20Accounts) for a custom quote.

All prices are in US Dollars.

Agolix offers a choice of pricing plans to meet your needs.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is structured around subscription tiers with annual billing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Perfect if you're just getting started with assessments
Best for a more customized client experience and the opportunity to monetize assessments
For those who want to showcase their brand with custom urls and branded emails
